title: Social media use by Donald Trump
deleted: After years of pressure, on January 8, 2021, at 3:21 PM, Twitter announced that they had permanently suspended Donald Trump due to the threat of further incitement of violence.<ref name=suspends/><ref>{{Cite news|last=Tiku|first=Nitasha|last2=Romm|first2=Tony|title=Twitter permanently suspends Trumpâ€™s account|language=en-US|work=The Washington Post|url=https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2021/01/08/twitter-trump-dorsey/|access-date=2021-01-08|issn=0190-8286}}</ref> This came after his account had been locked for 12 hour intervals twice and after it had had three of its tweets removed for their roles in instigating [[2021 storming of the United States Capitol|the storming of the U.S. Capitol]].
